name: Mount Disk on Host
description:
Mounts a block device (by UUID) on the Proxmox host.

This template only mounts the device on the host. To bind mount it into a container, use the bind-host template afterwards.

This template can be called independently and is safe to call multiple times (idempotent).

parameters.name: Storage Selection
parameters.description: Select storage to mount. Only filesystems prefixed with 'uuid:' are supported.

parameters.name: UID for mount directory
parameters.description: Optional: UID to set for the mount directory. Default is 0 (root).

parameters.name: GID for mount directory
parameters.description: Optional: GID to set for the mount directory. Default is 0 (root).

commands.description: Executes the script to mount the disk by UUID on the host.
